ruleContent.content:
<js>
function parseComments(n){
  for(var c=[],e=0;e<n.length;e++){
    var o=n[e]; c.push("".concat(o.createrId.userName,"｜").concat(o.createdAt.slice(0,10),"\n评分：").concat("🌟".repeat(o.score),"\n评语：").concat(o.content.replace(/([\u4e00-\u9fa5])(?=\n|$)/,"$1……").replace(/([^。！？—…]{9}[。；！？—…]+”?)([\u4e00-\u9fa5][^。！？—…]{7})/g,"$1\n$2")))}
return c.join("\n————\n");}
var data = JSON.parse(result);
data=data.data.comments;
data.length == 0 ? '暂无评价！': parseComments(data);
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
if(pageCount>1){pageCount=2};
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: class.book-rand-a@a@textNodes
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
'　　🔖最近更新：'
+result.match(/最新章节 ([^\n]+)/)[1]
+'\n　　🔖更新时间：'
+result.match(/更新时间 ([^\n]+)/)[1]
+'\n‎\n'
+result.match(/textarea hidden>([\W\w]+?)<\/texta/)[1].replace(/</g,'<').replace(/>/g,'>').replace(/'/g,"'")
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.book-title@tag.h2.0@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "💰":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

eval(result.match(/text=new Array\(".*?"\)/)[0]);
for(var i=0;i<text.length;i++){con +=text[i];}con=String(java.base64Decode(con));
result=con
}else{
	result=result
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + '▪' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
		intro: og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, ''),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
result.toArray().slice(0, 10).map(el => {
	var url = String(el.select('a:eq(0)').attr('href')).replace(/^\//, baseUrl.match(/(.+?\/\/[^\/]+\/)/)[1]);
	var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
	var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text());
	var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
	return {
		name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
		author: og('novel:author'),
		kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
		latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + '▪' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
		intro: og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, ''),
		cover: og('image'),
		url: url,
	};
}); 
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.登陆后阅读进度回自动同步云端，章节索引会自动跟随云端(App)进度，请在App里选择章节
2.登陆阅读限免或已购vip章节为空时, 试试书籍详情页, 源变量填：1
3.清除缓存再刷新

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let pc_url = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let mob_url = `https://m.qidian.com/book/${bid}/${chapter.id}.html`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${mob_url},{'webView': true}` : pc_url
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
